body: Hi Will, Which version of Radiance is installed on your system? There was a bug in Radiance for Windows which is fixed now. Try to re-install Radiance from this link: [https://github.com/NREL/Radiance/releases/download/4.2.2/radiance-4...](https://github.com/NREL/Radiance/releases/download/4.2.2/radiance-4.2.2-win32.exe)
